long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
v1.2: Updated after stuff made a change to their comment system. Thanks for your patience!

stuff plus:

* Prevents videos from auto-playing on mouseover
* Reorders comments so those with the most votes show first
* Shows total number of votes on comments
* Shows how you voted on a comment (dims the one you didn't select)
